skills.skill: Software Proficiency (MS Office, Primavera P6, MS Project, Adobe Writer, Visio)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the overall performance of larger construction projects and organize the program development effort.
Lead and drive larger, more complex construction projects, ensuring adherence to standardized procedures and processes.
Mentor project team and assess training needs to benefit future project leaders.
Maintain relationships with the Principals of major subcontractors and ensure overall program asset management.
Continually seek and capitalize upon opportunities to increase customer satisfaction and deepen client relationships.
Make presentations to Executive Management on current and forecasted performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Construction, Civil, Mechanical, Electrical Engineering, Construction Management or Architecture (Master’s degree preferred)
Certification as a PMI Project Management Professional (PMP) is highly preferred.
